textBox.richText: Powder Hunting with Alli, Max, and Gunter

So here I am, in mid-june 2011, going back through the old archives. I did the original movie on Alli’s mac, so I don’t have the original edits anymore. Gonna go through it again (as it probably needs a better soundtrack), but looking back, this is one of my favorite days from last season. Skiing with Alli, Max, Gunter...good attitudes, good snow, and just playing around and enjoying the day.
